snippet: Also on the Minute, Cate Blanchett’s source of inspiration for her role in the film “Blue Jasmine,” and scientists plan to sequence King Richard III’s genetic code.
abstract: Also on the Minute, Cate Blanchett’s source of inspiration for her role in the film “Blue Jasmine,” and scientists plan to sequence King Richard III’s genetic code.

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
